scripts.//lisa-force-scripts-operations: Required by Lisa to perform standard cdk operations

dependencies.//lisa-force-dependencies: Required by Lisa to ensure all necessary dependencies are included for CDK operations

devDependencies.//lisa-force-dev-dependencies: Required by Lisa to ensure all necessary dev dependencies are included for CDK operations

engines.//lisa-defaults-engines: Suggested by Lisa to ensure consistent environment for CDK operations. Can be overridden by the user if necessary.

bin.//lisa-force-bin: Required by Lisa to ensure the CLI entry points are correctly defined
